revision.text:
This is the default [[sound sequence]] for opening a normal door with a DORS* texture in ''[[Strife]]''. It is redirected from [[DoorStone]]. It is also used for opening [[animated door]]s with the DORSTN01 texture.
==== [[SNDSEQ]] definition ==== :DoorOpenStone play doors/stone_open nostopcutoff end [[Category:Sound sequences]]
